content: Yes, it's a common misconception that older consumers are not using technology. However, research suggests that older consumers are increasingly becoming tech-savvy, as they use technology to stay connected with family and friends, access information, and engage in online shopping. For example, social media platforms such as Facebook, Twitter and Instagram have become popular among older consumers, and many are using smartphones and tablets to access the internet. As technology becomes more intuitive and user-friendly, it is expected that more older consumers will continue to adopt technology in their daily lives.
